DOC.brief_summary: To observe the efficacy of Sanfu herbal patch and Sanfu moxibustion on allergic rhinitis.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment of Sanfu Herbal Patch for Allergic Rhinitis: a Controlled Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: 1. The patients conform to the diagnostic criteria of allergic rhinitis; 2. Sex unlimited; 3. To be aged from 570; 4. The course of the disease in more than one year 1. Do not conform the inclusion criteria; 2. The patients who allergic to adhesive plaster, drugs and application materials; The people who has scar constitution and skin injuries; 3. The people who has chronic sinusitis History; 4. The people who has paroxysmal disease of respiratory system like asthma; 5. The people who accept the treatment of specific immunity therapy and system hormone therapy in recent a year; 6. Pregnant women and nursing mothers; 7. Tuberculosis and hepatitis patients; The people who's Ur, ALT, AST is higher than the normal value 2 times; 8. The people who have mental disease; 9. The people who smoking to more than 10 cigarettes per day for 10 years; 10. the people who has other problem which is not suitable to participate in this project study
